Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Not much on sushi, but this place was great. Many varieties to choose from. This restaurant was set up nice, so you could watch the chef prepare the many kinds of sushi they offered. Plus it was a family owned. Would come again if in the area.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: I recently visited the Red Sun, for the first time. I wanted to try some new things and I did. Everything had a good taste and the server was nice. I'd like to try this place again some time. The best thing I tried was the Beef Gyudon. I enjoyed it. The pink sauce that came with the potstickers was delicious.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: This is a great family owned restaurant.  The Ramen was awesome.  The sushi awesome.  Highly recommend

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: I've been going to Red Sun for about 2-3 years now and I have to say that I've had a lot of good experiences. The food is usually really good and the servers really polite. It's the kind of service you would expect spending $50-$75 on ‚Ä¶

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Great Food!  Service is good but the staff can get a bit overwhelmed at peak times.  I absolutely recommend both their Sushi and Ramen bowls!  They are a small business so show them some love if you are in the area.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Tried The Red Sun for the first time tonight and was not disappointed! It's very clean and laid back, and has great music and friendly/quick service. The food is excellent! It's beautifully plated, the ingredients taste fresh and delicious, ‚Ä¶

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Considering the ratings on google, I was shocked to be served sushi this bad. I paid $13 for a roll that I would turn down for $5 at a gas station. Our edamame was served in burnt oil as well. Please do not support this business. If you‚Äôre going to make a living serving sushi, don‚Äôt serve trash for an outrageous price.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Loved it! Stopped in for carry out on a calm Saturday night, and they even brought me a water while I waited. There's a nice selection of ramen options on the regular menu, and they offered me an expanded ramen menu that has classic ‚Ä¶

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Excellent sushi. The sashimi was out of this world. We had a fantastic experience and look forward to many more.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Hands down the only place you want to be for ramen and sushi in all of the St. Charles area. The owner and his son were incredibly knowledgeable and friendly creating a very warm atmosphere from the start. Our server Justin made things feel ‚Ä¶

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Nice new sushi restaurant on Main Street. Atmosphere was great, sushi was high quality, service was quick and friendly. Friday BOGO sake special is quite a value!

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: There wasnt many people eating when we arrived on  Friday night at 7 which made us wonder but I'm so happy we still went inside. The food and service was excellent! People started filling the place and it was an overall great dining experience. I'm hopeful more people support this family owned business so they are here to stay!!

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: After going to this restaurant twice I wont go back. Both times, orders got messed up had to wait 40 minutes for the rest of the order with no discount. Host did not seem to care. He said "uh I guess they forgot to make it" would not reccomend. Ramen was cool everything else was not that good.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Sis & I tried this spot for our sushi date...sushi was delish & my 1st time trying a ramen dish was great! Its not a big place but could tell the 1 guy at the sushi bar new his stuff & perfectly crafted every roll...& if I had to guess maybe 1 or 2 chefs/cooks in the back. This makes for carefulness & quality food & I love that!

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: 1/28/21: Updating my review to 5 stars! Staff is masked and food is still amazing! I'm so glad we went back to give it a try to see that the staff is wearing masks now! I got to safely enjoy amazing ramen and sushi!! Go get yours today too ‚Ä¶

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Delicious, fresh sushi with some unique options. Excellent service. I look forward to dining here again!

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Usually not the type to leave a review. However, this place is superb. The spring rolls were perfectly cooked. The spicy edamame was great. The ramen was the best part. The spicy beef was delicious. Definitely will be going back.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Nice small sushi restaurant in downtown st Charles.  New restaurant has basic sushi menu and limited  wine and beer list.  Food was delicious. Nice atmosphere. Lighting is low. Staff was friendly.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Food was fantastic! Service was awesome! If your looking for a great ramen this is your place! Showed up with 9 and seated right away and eating in less than 20!

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Amazing food. Staff was super knowledgeable and friendly. Made great recommendations. They have an option to build your own roll with a variety of choices. Salmon and yellowtail sashimi were the best I‚Äôve ever had. Our server Justin said ‚Ä¶

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: not the best sushi but it was still pretty good. my friends did not like the quality of the sushi as much as I did though. Overall nothing special but nice atmosphere and decent food.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Good service, good ramen.  Very nice presentation, I personally like a saltier broth.  I really like the decor.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: I got my sushi fix. I had the Orange Sun roll. It was good! üç£

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: The building is old obviously because it is in old Town st charles, but the smell of must when you walk in is overwhelming. The pork gyoza and seaweed salad were good. My husband had a salmon avocado roll that was mostly crumbly rice with ‚Ä¶

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Just tried this place tonight (8/17/19) on a whim and glad my wife and I stopped by.  We had the red sun roll, the orange sun roll, and the salmon crunch roll.  All three were great.  Many places try to over stuff their rolls and make too ‚Ä¶

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Ok so this place is great, it‚Äôs super cute on the inside. I didn‚Äôt sit in but I picked up an order (pandemic). The guy that helped me was so nice and so easy to chat with about ordering. This is going to be my go-to sushi place now. Such good ramen, sushi, and appetizers.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: We ordered through grubhub and had it delivered about two blocks down the street. The order was correct but the sushi was warm and old. One of the sushi plates looked like it was just tossed into the container while the others were still ‚Ä¶

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Great sushi and good ramen. Random Google find and definitely worth a stop in! My fiance and I had a mid week dinner date. The server was friendly, the music was good, the owner was present and nice. Definitely make a stop in!

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: So good!! I loved the veggie ramen! Everyone working was friendly and I will definitely go back

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: This is a nice place to eat, but it has room to improve. They are working on expanding the menu, and what they have so far is really yummy. My friend felt that the rice fell apart a little bit. However what we tried we were satisfied with ‚Ä¶

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Absolutely loved the vegetarian ramen option they had. The avocado roll and veggie friendly dumplings were amazing! We will be back!

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: I had heard great things and was very disappointed. The ramen tasted greasy with no clear flavor profile. The egg was over done the presentation was sad. I've never left a bowl of ramen unfinished or at least not taken it home. I had about ‚Ä¶

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: First time here! Wonderful service by Justin! Great selection on the menu! I have a shellfish allergy and I saw the sushi chef personally clearing and cleaning his area to ensure no allergens contaminated my asparagus roll! The place was ‚Ä¶

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Mediocre food and horrible service. The server was not attentive to any of the tables and had to be asked several times by multiple tables to have their water refilled because they had been empty for awhile. The man behind the counter ‚Ä¶

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: The sushi was good but the "mixed" drinks were out of a bottle and the plates took 5-10 min between each plate it took 35 min to get all the plates for 5 people.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Sushi was fantastic. Beautiful presentation as well. You may wait a bit longer for your sushi to be prepared but it‚Äôs totally worth the wait. Cool indie rock music playing and spotless restaurant. Support small business and stop in. You won‚Äôt be disappointed.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Quality food and attentive service!  The plate presentation was beautiful!  Give them some love and stop by this small business!

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Sushi was fine, the rice clearly isn't good quality as it was falling apart. Ramen was a good amount, but there was a large solid chunk on onion in mine, and the broth was very condensed and too salty. Also, they brought out each persons order seperately instead of all at once. Nice employees though.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Always great food and get service! Love their take on miso, and the takoyaki is amazing. I enjoy the sushi also, but a good deal of it is a California roll base. Though I may not be the biggest California roll fan, everything else about the sushi is top notch. Definitely recommend trying this place out, they even have some ramen fusion.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Service is ok, the ramen is so horribly salty I don't know how anyone eats it. Beside the saltiness the flavor is bland and tastes artificial. Noodles were underdone and eggs were hard-boiled, not soft-boiled. Made for a bad experience. The sushi was also lackluster. I wouldn't come back here or order to-go.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: First time going and we will absolutely go back! Salmon sashimi was so fresh, all the rolls were beautiful and delicious. The staff was so friendly.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Absolutely fantastic place!  I love the specialty ramens and the hot sake. The staff was super friendly and atmosphere/decor is great.  I highly recommend this place if you are into Japanese food, or if you are looking for a new great place in the st Charles area.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text:
This was my first time eating here.
Me and my girlfriend came here for her birthday dinner.
Our server Justin was awesome, the food was delicious and had a chill clean ‚Ä¶

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: I had never been here before, until my daughter took me today. Service was amazing!! We had crab Rangoon for an appetizer, the Northern Lights roll and then shrimp ramen. Everything was absolutely delicious and I WILL be back!!! Thank you Red Sun for a great experience!!!

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Good asian food. Sushi was great. Small and quaint.  Won't break the bank. Two can eat for under $30 no problem. Nice enough for date night. Wouldn't feel out of place if you decided to dress up but relaxed enough to show up in jeans and a t-shirt.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Best ramen we have had in St Louis so far. We do ask for chili oil and chili paste, to spice it up.  We enjoyed their spicy tuna roll.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Ate here and it was very good Sushi.   Plating was good and the rolls I had were very good.  Seemed like they were still figuring out the Saki as a few options were just not available on a Monday when I was there.  A fun twist at the end, you can shake dice for a chance to reduce your bill.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Sushi was very good. Pricing very reasonable. Clean place with good modern decor. They have fun specials! As far as unique tolls go the hello Kitty and mango roll are excellent choices. I highly recommend! ‚Ä¶

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Food was very good. Ordered Beef Gyudon and was not disappointed

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Nice little local place. Tried the edamame, spicy salmon roll, crunch roll, and tiger roll. I would not do the crunch roll again, it was not very good at all. I would do the rest again however, especially the edamame and tiger roll. Tuesday ‚Ä¶

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: The sushi cost a little more here than most places we visit, but it was extremely delicious.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: St. Charles FINALLY got a new sushi place. Wasabi and Sushi Ai aren't the only ones in town now. Pros: I have room to sit comfortably and the place has a wonderful look and feel. The construction is obviously new so everything seems sharp, ‚Ä¶

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Very friendly staff. Prompt Service. Delicious ramen and sushi. Wine is very reasonably priced. Highly recommend if you're looking for a great lunch or dinner meal! We will be going back!

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: I tried the orange sun sushi and it was excellent.  The staff was very friendly and was very knowledgeable with their menu. Will definitely revisit there soon.   Thank you for an awesome meal!

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Sushi was fantastic and fresh. Wonderful service as well!

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: The sushi is AMAZING, appetizer of shrimp tempura was flawless and the service was excellent. Couldn't ask for anything more and we WILL be back. Highly recommend going over and over.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Had great service and EXCELLENT food tonight! We had ramen and sushi and everything tasted great!

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text:
Absolutely delicious food and fantastic, friendly staff!
Unfortunately they were limited seating due to COVID-19, so we ordered to go. I was not disappointed in the level of food we received! Definitely will be going back

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: I have gone to the red sun twice now and loves every second with it!!! Great workers, great food... definitely will go again ... I have gone 2 time so far

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: My goto for Sushi. Ramin is really good, but the Northern Lights Sushi is the best I have ever had! Off menu, but you won't be disappointed!

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Amazing! Understaffed but our waiter worked tirelessly to make sure everyone was helped expeditiously. Incredible shrimp rolls and great ramen. We will be back!

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: We ordered 6 different items from the menu, including tempura, ramen and sushi...all delicious.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: The best ramen I‚Äôve had in the St. Louis area. The gyoza is great too and my husband said the red sun sushi is the best sushi he‚Äôs ever had.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Went to The Red Sun this evening for dinner. It was excellent. Loved the music, loved how laid back and clean it was, and the service and food were excellent. I had the chef choose based off a few pikes and the rolls were very good. Highly recommend.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Food average, service average.  The sushi felt apart when trying to use chopsticks and our margarita was made from mixes (as was many of their drinks) and for some reason salt was put IN the  glass which made the margarita extremely ‚Ä¶

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Food was ok but it took forever and it was one at a time. Got the sushi before the appetizers and then waited awhile to get other dishes.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: The Russian owners were gracious but the  flash frozen sushi served basically unthawed was very wrong, ive had Sushi since the late 70's in Japanese communities. STAY AWAY

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: It has amazing food!! First time there tonight, it was great! Pretty good price as well. Would highly reccomend.  I plan on going there again.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Excellent sushi! Very good food and usually not crowded. Great place to go. Much better than wasabi.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: I've eaten sushi at The Red Sun twice. The food and atmosphere are great. I'm going back today to try the ramen. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: The sushi toppings were WAY too cold, and it threw off the taste. Service was very slow even though it was empty, and the mochi seemed old.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Justin was absolutely amazing! I came for my birthday dinner and was beyond amazed with everything. The service and food was stellar, this place just became a regular spot üòä

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Service was not bad but also not good. Food was decent. Everything took a long time even though there was only one other couple in the restaurant.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Very good sushi and ramen, friendly staff, and the ramen themed movie posters on the wall were a nice touch. My favorite was the Matrix one.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Moving to Pennsylvania,  so will miss this new gem in St Charles...love Justin the server too. Try the Hello Kitty and get the Mochi Ice Cream..worth it!

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: gross salty ramen, not fresh ingredients. A shame, really. Main Street needed a good sushi place. This isn't it.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Had the ramen which was great, but will certainly come back for the sushi which looked fantastic.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Great ramen and sushi. Amazing service by Justin... my eleven year old even said so unsolicited.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: GO HERE, if you enjoy Tani Bistro in Clayton or Tokyo Sushi in south county. Put this place in your sushi restaurant rotation.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Mj make best sushi in world awsome amazing will b back soon

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: The pork and chicken tonkotsu were delicious. Planning on going back to try the breaking bad ramen

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Cute ambiance, friendly employees, delicious sushi! I think this is a hidden gem, I'll be back for sure.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Sushi, real wasabi and gourmet ramen.  For StCh, it‚Äôs amazing.  And a full bar.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: LOVE THE RAMEN HERE! Would love to see the Ramen menu on the website or Facebook. Would also like to enjoy this on Sunday! ;)

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Highly recommended. The staff was nice and the food was delicious, try the spicy beef ramen.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: It's marketed as a sushi restaurant and the sushi is pretty subpar. I do highly recommend the ramen.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Sushi was AMAZING!!!! Waiter (Justin) was fun!!! Reasonable prices.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: The Sushi was amazing, and our server Justin was the best EVER!

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Excellent service and a great atmosphere! Most importantly, the sushi was on point!

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Yes yes yes a 1000x yes! This is my comfort food!

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: The service was great, the food was excellently fresh. Will comeback for sure.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Best ramen I've had around St. Louis so far.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Great food, excellent service

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: The Ramen just can't be beat, it is delicious and much needed on Main Street

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: This place is fantastic food is delicious and very affordable.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: They have hard boiled egg in ramen, which is a sin.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Intimate setting. Very informative and helpful server. Overall great meal and experience.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Spicy beef ramen, YUM!!

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text:
Always great food, atmosphere and interactive staff.
Highly recommend.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Not Opened‚Ä¶Please update this information.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Really delicious!

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Food was good, but they got rid of the lunch special.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Two visits, very consistent and loved the high quality fish and wine.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: I litteraly go here all the time love the place and the people that work there are cool

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Very good sushi. Nice place in a nice area.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Great atmosphere and the staff super friendly! That's most of the battle right there:)

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: We go every Saturday and have never been disappointed.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Yall closed before 9. It was 830 to be exact... on a Saturday night.... very disappointing.....

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Great sushi, friendly staff.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: The Red Sun roll was delicious and the service was excellent.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: From the reviews I can tell this restaurant will be around for a while cant wait to go.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Cozy spot with low cost quality sushi.

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: took my mother  and friend and was treated great!

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Their spicy beef ramen is to die forüòãü§§

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Super friendly staff, great food!

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: The best sushi i ever had period

Name: The Red Sun
Review Text: Delicious food, amazing service. Must try!
